title: Photo Editor (Freelance/Part-Time)
job_overview:
I am looking for a skilled Photo Editor with a strong eye for detail and creativity to help with a variety of image editing tasks. The ideal candidate should have experience in natural, non-AI-looking edits and be highly proficient in Adobe Photoshop and Illustrator, along with other relevant editing software.

Responsibilities:
- High-quality photo manipulation and retouching
- Seamless merging of people into different images
- Editing out objects or people from photos while maintaining natural backgrounds
- Enhancing lighting and image clarity
- Performing realistic face swaps
- Refining AI-generated images to look more natural and believable

Requirements:
- Proven experience with Adobe Photoshop and Illustrator
- Strong portfolio demonstrating natural-looking edits
- Ability to work with precision and meet deadlines
- Experience with AI image refinement is a plus

This is a freelance or part-time position with flexible hours. If you're passionate about clean, natural edits and photo storytelling, we'd love to see your work!

To apply: Please share your portfolio and rates.
